name: Reversi
overview: Reversi is an ancient board game for two players, where the object is to get more pieces than your opponents. This is the computer version for the VIC-20 has you pitted against the computer. Pieces can be put down horizontally, vertically, or diagonally, and is done by entering a grid reference (from A1 to H8). Any of your opponent pieces that lie between your target spot and the previous one will be yours. People who are unfamiliar with the game will be able to view some instructions as well as a demonstration. Game was part of several two-packs including duos with Line Up 4 and Maze Muncher.
